case_data.title: Denied Boarding due to Overbooking
case_data.description: Customer was denied boarding as the flight was overbooked beyond capacity.

resolution_note: Customer was denied boarding due to overbooking. Rebooked on next available flight and provided meal vouchers.

activities.description: Customer expressed frustration over delay. Apologized and offered compensation.
Sent confirmation of rebooking and voucher details.

case_data.title: Denied Boarding due to Missing ID
case_data.description: Customer was unable to board due to not carrying a valid government-issued ID.

resolution_note: Customer did not carry valid ID. Educated on travel requirements and rebooked for next day.

activities.description: Explained ID policy and rebooking options.
Confirmed rebooking for next day with customer.

case_data.title: Denied Boarding due to Late Arrival
case_data.description: Customer arrived at the gate after closure and was denied boarding.

resolution_note: Customer arrived after gate closure. Rebooked on next flight and offered lounge access.

activities.description: Customer accepted resolution and appreciated lounge access.
Sent updated itinerary and lounge pass.

case_data.title: Denied Boarding due to System Error
case_data.description: Customer was not listed in the boarding system due to a technical glitch.

resolution_note: Customer was not on boarding list due to system glitch. Provided upgrade and apology.

activities.description: Logged system error and escalated to IT.
Sent apology and upgrade confirmation.

case_data.title: Denied Boarding due to Oversized Carry-On
case_data.description: Customer refused to check in an oversized carry-on bag and was denied boarding.

resolution_note: Customer refused to check oversized carry-on. Educated on baggage policy and rebooked.

activities.description: Customer was upset but accepted rebooking after explanation.
Sent baggage policy and rebooking confirmation.

case_data.title: Rude Behavior by Check-in Staff
case_data.description: Customer reported that the check-in staff was dismissive and unhelpful during baggage drop.

resolution_note: Apologized to customer and escalated staff conduct to airport supervisor. Offered travel voucher as goodwill.

activities.description: Customer was visibly upset and requested formal complaint be logged.
Sent apology and voucher details.

case_data.title: Cabin Crew Ignored Assistance Request
case_data.description: Customer requested help with overhead luggage but was ignored by cabin crew.

resolution_note: Apologized and assured corrective training for crew. Provided lounge access for next flight.

activities.description: Customer appreciated the follow-up and accepted resolution.
Sent lounge pass and apology note.

case_data.title: Gate Agent Raised Voice
case_data.description: Customer reported that gate agent raised voice during boarding query.

resolution_note: Spoke to gate staff and issued internal warning. Customer offered priority boarding on next flight.

activities.description: Customer requested assurance that staff would be held accountable.
Sent confirmation of priority boarding benefit.

case_data.title: Inappropriate Comment by Crew
case_data.description: Customer reported that a crew member made an inappropriate personal comment.

resolution_note: Crew member was reported to HR for review. Customer offered seat upgrade and written apology.

activities.description: Customer requested anonymity in complaint handling.
Sent apology and upgrade confirmation.

case_data.title: Staff Ignored Elderly Passenger
case_data.description: Customer witnessed staff ignoring an elderly passenger needing assistance.

resolution_note: Thanked customer for reporting. Staff reminded of assistance protocols. Offered free seat selection on next flight.

activities.description: Customer emphasized importance of elderly care.
Sent confirmation of seat selection benefit.

case_data.title: Charged Twice for Same Booking
case_data.description: Customer was charged twice for the same flight booking due to a payment gateway error.

resolution_note: Verified duplicate transaction and processed refund for the extra charge. Apologized for inconvenience.

activities.description: Customer shared transaction screenshots for verification.
Sent refund confirmation and apology.

case_data.title: Incorrect Currency Conversion
case_data.description: Customer was billed in USD instead of INR, resulting in higher charges due to conversion fees.

resolution_note: Identified billing system error. Issued partial refund for conversion fees and corrected billing profile.

activities.description: Customer requested billing in local currency for future bookings.
Sent refund details and updated billing preferences.

case_data.title: Extra Charges for Seat Selection
case_data.description: Customer was charged for seat selection despite choosing a free seat option.

resolution_note: Confirmed system glitch in seat pricing. Refunded seat selection fee and flagged issue to IT.

activities.description: Customer appreciated quick resolution and refund.
Sent refund receipt and confirmation of issue escalation.

case_data.title: Flight Delayed Due to Weather
case_data.description: Customer's flight was delayed by 4 hours due to heavy fog at the departure airport.

resolution_note: Apologized for delay caused by weather conditions. Provided meal voucher and rebooking flexibility.

compensations.details: Customer allowed to reschedule within 7 days without fee

activities.description: Customer accepted compensation and appreciated proactive communication.
Sent voucher and rebooking instructions.

case_data.title: Technical Issue Caused Flight Delay
case_data.description: Customer's flight was delayed by 3 hours due to a last-minute technical inspection.

resolution_note: Explained delay due to mandatory safety checks. Offered lounge access and apology.

activities.description: Customer was initially frustrated but calmed after explanation.
Sent lounge pass and apology message.
